snippet: Advertisers and marketers are targeting their messages to news about the storm.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes that marketing and public relations executives are struggling with how best to respond to Hurricane Sandy, attempting to strike image of public service and avoid perception that they are capitalizing on disaster.
lead_paragraph: Advertisers and marketers are targeting their messages to news about the storm.

headline.seo: Marketers Ride the Coattails of a Storm, Not All Successfully
headline.main: Capitalizing on Disaster, Sometimes With Results That Match
headline.print_headline: Capitalizing on Disaster, Sometimes With Results That Match
